metadata.name: Mstsc.EXE Execution From Uncommon Parent
metadata.comment: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file located in suspicious locations.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\brave.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\ccleanerbrowser.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\chromium.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\firefox.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\iexplore.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoftedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\opera.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\vivaldi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\whale.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\outlook.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mstsc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mstsc.exe'))

output.summary: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file located in suspicious locations.
